info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 26 at 6:46PM MDT until April 26 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
TORABQ
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... East Central Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico...
* Until 730 PM MDT.
* At 646 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located 14 miles south of Elkins, or 32 miles east of Roswell, moving southeast at 40 mph.
HAZARD...Damaging tornado and half dollar size hail.
SOURCE...Public reported tornado on the ground.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Mainly rural areas of East Central Chaves County.
This includes Highway 380 between Mile Markers 182 and 199.
info.instruction:
Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
This storm has a history of producing tornadoes.
Report severe weather to your nearest law enforcement agency or the National Weather Service office in Albuquerque NM.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 7:30 PM MDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 7:30 PM MDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 7:30 PM MDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 7:30 PM MDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
